name: 2017_08_26_YinYang
description:
Yin & Yang have always been in a push and back situation.
This game is a battle between them to know who from the Yin or the Yang should win.

Launch your minions to win eat territory and cut the victory to the opponent commander.

Require:
- 2 players
- 2 controllers

Created at the 24H Game Jam, BBQ Jam 2017 (Luxembourg).

Team: Baptiste Remy -  Emile Sonnevled- Maxime Barnier - Strée Eloi


Find all information on the game, here:
https://eloiprojectlink.page.link/2017_08_26_YinYang
